p: The participants were predominantly (68.6%) from the rural site (Kampung Jawa). However, there was smaller representation from the urban (Kampung Abdullah, 21.7%) and semi-urban (Taman Segar, 9.7%) sites as well. The majority of the participants were ethnic Malay (72.9%) and the remaining were Chinese (27.1%). The great majority of the Malays (94%) were concentrated in the rural site and the Chinese were entirely (100%) from the urban and semi-urban sites.
